memories.summary: On January 11, 2025, in Ann Arbor, Sophia studied in the university library, laptop open beside stacks of textbooks.
On February 6, 2025, in Chicago, Sophia attended a career fair with her classmate Daniel, both holding folders of résumés.
On March 9, 2025, in Boston, Sophia worked with a project team in a lab, discussing diagrams spread across a whiteboard.
On April 18, 2025, in New York, Sophia joined friends at a tech talk, captured while listening in an auditorium.
On May 12, 2025, in San Francisco, Sophia started her summer internship, standing in front of the office with a badge clipped to her shirt.
On June 25, 2025, in San Francisco, Sophia worked with mentor Alex over coffee, reviewing notes on her laptop.
On July 30, 2025, in San Francisco, Sophia presented her project to a small group, standing by a projector screen.
On September 2, 2025, in Seattle, Sophia visited Pike Place Market with Daniel, holding a coffee cup in one hand.
On October 21, 2025, in Toronto, Sophia joined a university exchange trip, taking a group photo with classmates near the CN Tower.
On December 15, 2025, in Ann Arbor, Sophia celebrated the end of the semester with her study group, holding a slice of cake at a café.

qa_pairs.question: Who did Sophia work with on academic or internship projects?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Rachel and Leo in Boston, Alex in San Francisco, and classmates during the Toronto trip.

qa_pairs.question: What milestones mark Sophia’s academic and professional growth?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Attending a career fair, starting an internship, presenting her project, and going on an exchange trip.

qa_pairs.question: Which memories involve food or drink, and what do they reflect?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Coffee with mentor Alex, coffee at Pike Place Market, and cake with her study group — showing casual bonding moments.

qa_pairs.question: Which cities did Sophia travel to outside her home in Ann Arbor?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: Chicago, Boston, New York, San Francisco, Seattle, and Toronto.

qa_pairs.question: Which memory best reflects celebration, and what details indicate it?
qa_pairs.answer_gold: The café gathering in Ann Arbor with cake, marking the end of the semester.
